body_html:
Do you want me to get in on this?
I was thinking of duplicating the waiter table into the Tensor-Buffer, instead of the rendezvous.
So the reaction to RDMA_MESSAGE_BUFFER_RESPONSE would be similar to SendNextItem() but would replace RecvLocalAsync with a lookup in it's local table.
I think a seperate queue for items is also required for this to work.

body:
Do you want me to get in on this?
I was thinking of duplicating the waiter table into the Tensor-Buffer, instead of the rendezvous.
So the reaction to RDMA_MESSAGE_BUFFER_RESPONSE would be similar to SendNextItem() but would replace RecvLocalAsync with a lookup in it's local table.
I think a seperate queue for items is also required for this to work.
